name: Vegan Granola
description: This is the best Vegan Granola recipe! Seasoned with cinnamon and maple syrup, every bite of the golden brown oat clusters tastes so warm and sweet.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup avocado oil OR melted coconut oil
1/2 cup dried cranberries, blueberries, cherries or raisins
1/2 cup coconut flakes or coconut chips

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the oats, almonds, cashews, brown sugar, cinnamon and salt until mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the oats, almonds, cashews, brown sugar, cinnamon and salt until mixed.

recipeInstructions.text: Now pour in the maple syrup, vanilla and oil. Mix with a large wooden spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Now pour in the maple syrup, vanilla and oil. Mix with a large wooden spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the granola mixture to the parchment lined pan and spread into an even layer. It should all be touching, especially if you want big granola chunks.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the granola mixture to the parchment lined pan and spread into an even layer. It should all be touching, especially if you want big granola chunks.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 12 minutes, then stir the granola. Press it down evenly with a spatula, then bake for 12-15 more minutes, until lightly golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 12 minutes, then stir the granola. Press it down evenly with a spatula, then bake for 12-15 more minutes, until lightly golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the granola cool in the pan for an hour, and don't touch it or stir it at all.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the granola cool in the pan for an hour, and don't touch it or stir it at all.

recipeInstructions.text: Once it's been at least an hour, add the dried fruit and optional chocolate chips/coconut and break the cooled granola into large or small pieces with your hands or a spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: Once it's been at least an hour, add the dried fruit and optional chocolate chips/coconut and break the cooled granola into large or small pieces with your hands or a spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Store in an airtight container at room temperature for 1-2 weeks or freeze in a freezer safe container.
recipeInstructions.name: Store in an airtight container at room temperature for 1-2 weeks or freeze in a freezer safe container.

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy as a snack, on top of noon-dairy yogurt with fruit or in a bowl with your favorite non-dairy milk.
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy as a snack, on top of noon-dairy yogurt with fruit or in a bowl with your favorite non-dairy milk.
